Software

CauseMap

CauseMap is an implementation of Convergent Cross Mapping (CCM), an algorithm designed to detect causation in complex non-linear systems. Read more at the website! cyrusmaher.github.io/CauseMap.jl


MOSAIC

MOSAIC is a tool for improving ortholog detection through integration of methods. You can access the project website at pythonhosted.org/bio-MOSAIC/. For more detailed background, check out our blog post here.
